snippet: The company said its performance in Asia was hurt by customer perception issues in Japan, where a human tooth was found in its food.
abstract: McDonald's says January sales fell 12.6 percent at restaurants open at least 13 months in division including Asia; says sales in Japan were damaged by customer perception issues.
lead_paragraph: The company said its performance in Asia was hurt by customer perception issues in Japan, where a human tooth was found in its food.

headline.print_headline: Mcdonald’s Sales Slow in Asia as Consumer Perceptions Sour
headline.main: McDonald’s Sales Slow in Asia as Consumer Perceptions Sour
